title: Google Vaunts New Gemini Code Assist Tool at Cloud Next 2024
author: Chris J Preimesberger
description: At Google Cloud Next '24, Google showed off its continuing dedication to all things AI in the form of several new developer tools and new AI-focused chips.
cntitle: Google 在 Cloud Next 2024 上吹嘘新的 Gemini 代码辅助工具
cndescription: 在 Google Cloud Next '24 上，Google 展示了其对所有 AI 事物的持续投入，形式是若干新的开发者工具和新的以 AI 为重点的芯片。
